template_data.title:
Masters of the Wild:
A Guidebook to Barbarians, Druids, and Rangers
template_data.author: [[Mike Selinker]], [[David Eckelberry]]

document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.author: [[Mike Selinker]], [[David Eckelberry]]
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Chapter 1: Nature's Lore
* Chapter 2: Skills and Feats
* Chapter 3: Tools of the Trade
* Chapter 4: Animals
* Chapter 5: Prestige Classes
* Chapter 6: Spells
document_data.Description: ''Masters of the Wild'' provides supplemental information for characters belonging to the [[barbarian]], [[druid]], and [[ranger]] base classes and was the introduction of Natural Feats. It also contained tips for creating and playing characters of the aforementioned classes, as well as several prestige classes.
